title: Egg Omlette
ingredients: Optional fillings - cheese, diced vegetables, ham
preparation: For a quick omelette, beat 4 eggs with salt and pepper, then cook in a buttered pan until the edges set. Add fillings, fold, and cook until done. Enjoy a speedy and tasty omelette for a satisfying meal!

title: Corn on the knob
preparation: brush fresh corn with olive oil, sprinkle with salt, pepper, and optional seasonings. Grill over medium-high heat for 10-15 minutes until tender and charred. Serve with your favorite toppings.
